COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge branch 'dev' into querykram * dev: fixed UserNotFoundException for friend test fixed #60: 500 in FriendActivities

Merge branch 'dev' * dev: (57 commits) JavaDoc TODO's splitted service class restore rights validate coordinate bounds for bboxes simplified filtering query measurements by bbox/track/user more appropiate method names pagination for bbox queried tracks get tracks by bbox and user methods for filtering measurements/tracks by bbox & tracks/users removed obsolete methods do not omit exception added missing $geometry operator bounding box class as query parameter fixed UserNotFoundException for friend test fixed #60: 500 in FriendActivities fix for autermann :o fixed get tracks by bbox track querying by bbox fixes ...
Merge branch 'dev' * dev: more explicit access restrictions test for schema validation fixed invalid activity schema (closes #60) wrong mail address

Merge branch 'dev' into lod * dev: (73 commits) fixed 500 for HEAD method accept image/jpeg accept header at avatar resource track validation test fixed track schema more GeoJSON de/encoding tests simplified validation of schemas simplified validation tests JUnit Guice Runner changed error encoding schema support for geometry collections more explicit access restrictions test for schema validation fixed invalid activity schema (closes #60) wrong mail address JavaDoc TODO's splitted service class restore rights validate coordinate bounds for bboxes simplified filtering query measurements by bbox/track/user ...
